General.Name: Zhejiang Zomax Transmission
General.Description: Zhejiang Zomax Transmission Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production and sales of automobile transmissions and vehicle gears in China and internationally. The company provides new energy vehicle reducers and electronically controlled transfer cases; automobile gears, which includes automobile manual and automatic transmission, new energy vehicle reducer, automobile steering, automobile oil pump shaft, and automobile engine gears; motorcycle gears used in motorcycle engine gears; and agricultural machinery gears for use in agricultural machinery transmission gears. Its automotive transmission products are primarily used in light vehicles, such as pickup trucks, SUVs, MPVs, and light buses. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Wenling, China.
